text: I came here for a convocation. The auditorium is spacious, with air conditioning maintained at a comfortable level. The seats are comfortable and not cramped.

Auditorium is nice, though rather small for a huge school. Seats are comfortable.

However, NTU could organise their convocations better. Lack of signage along the roads, lack of ushers to guide people on where to go. Was rather confusing on where the main entrance was because everywhere just stated convocation but signages for Guests were so small and few.
Spacious and grand. Comfortable seating. NTU holds events such as convocations and TedX in this place. The capacity of the main theater is about 1700 people. Has function rooms for smaller events.

NTU Convocation 2022
